commit.message:
8264579: Use NEON vector load/store to access small size memory

For vector load/store with size 2/4/8/16, we can directly use NEON
load/store instead of partial load/store with predicate. Since
currently we are still using different registers (vReg/vecX/vecD) for
SVE and NEON codegen, we have to write different rules for NEON and
SVE, though they are the same physical regs (sharing lower parts).
